property_title: Ultra Luxury Villa Infinity with Wellness & Panoramic View in Alanya
property_description:
When people talk aboutluxury real estate in Alanya, they usually mention square meters and amenities. But how do you put a price on the moment your shoulders drop and your breathing slows just because you stepped onto your terrace? That's the kind of luxury that doesn't show up in property listings – the luxury of coming home to peace- a kind of luxury that also qualifies you forTurkish citizenship.

Picture this: You wake up, pad barefoot to your kitchen, and while your coffee brews, you're looking out at the ancient Alanya Castle sitting proudly on its cliff, the endless blue sea stretching to the horizon, mountains rising like sleeping giants in the distance. This isn't a vacation moment you'll treasure forever – this is just Tuesday morning at your new sea view property in Alanya.

But let's flip the script for a moment. Forget the morning coffee – let's talk about coming home after a long day. You pull into your private parking, take the elevator up to your sea view home in Alanya, and suddenly the stress of the day just melts away. Why?Because you're watching one of the most spectacular light shows on earth unfold right in front of you.

As the sun sets, Alanya Castle transforms from ancient stone to a glowing beacon, its lights reflecting off the water like scattered diamonds. You can see the little houses clustered around the castle hill starting to twinkle to life – windows lighting up one by one as families settle in for the evening, the warm glow of homes creating a constellation against the darkening hillside. And above it all, the moon begins its slow climb across the sky, casting silver paths across the water that seem to lead straight to your balcony.

This isn't just a view you admire – it's therapy you live with every single evening.

Standing proud on 600m² of carefully planned land, this 525m² architectural masterpiece rises through four thoughtfully designed floors. But calling it a house feels almost insulting to what it truly represents. This is your private resort, your wellness sanctuary, your entertainment hub, and your peaceful retreat all wrapped into one extraordinary address.

The moment you step inside, the distinction between indoor and outdoor living dissolves completely. Floor-to-ceiling glass walls don't just frame views – they invite the Mediterranean landscape to become part of your daily life. Dark and light grey stone cladding gives the exterior a sophisticated strength that commands respect, while the interior's palette of whites, creams, and soft greys creates an atmosphere that breathes tranquility into every corner.

Villa Infinity brings you sea view in Alanya along with the benefit of Turkish citizenship eligibility

Here’s where Villa Infinity transforms from a beautiful home into a life-changing investment. This property is fully eligible for theTurkish Citizenship by Investment program, giving you and your family the right to secure a new future in Turkey with all the privileges that come with it.

And Turkish citizenship means more than just holding a new passport. It offers security in a stable country, access to quality healthcare and education, and the chance to establish your life in a vibrant Mediterranean city. For investors, it creates a foundation for long-term returns, while for families it guarantees a safe and welcoming environment to call home. Villa Infinity is therefore not only a residence, but a direct path to a stronger and more certain future.

Architectural Character & Exterior

This striking villa makes a bold first impression with its sophisticated blend of dark and light grey stone cladding that creates a powerful, contemporary presence. The extensive use of floor-to-ceiling glass panels and sleek glass railings doesn't just bring a modern edge – it frames the surrounding landscape like a living artwork, making the views an integral part of the home's design story.

The architectural language speaks of understated luxury, where every material choice has been carefully considered to create a sense of permanence and elegance that will age gracefully over time.

Interior Palette & Atmosphere

Step inside, and you're immediately embraced by a carefully curated color story that feels both fresh and timeless. The interior palette revolves around crisp whites, warm creams, soft beiges, and sophisticated greys – a combination that breathes serenity into every corner while maintaining an air of refined elegance. This isn't just decoration; it's the foundation of a lifestyle that values calm sophistication over fleeting trends.

The overall effect is one of spacious tranquility, where natural light dances across neutral surfaces, creating an ever-changing canvas of subtle shadows and highlights throughout the day.

Living & Social Spaces

The heart of the home showcases stunning white marble-effect flooring with clean, linear patterns that immediately evoke the luxury of a five-star hotel. But this isn't cold or intimidating – quite the opposite. The flooring serves as a beautiful backdrop for carefully selected furniture pieces that prioritize both comfort and contemporary style.

The seating areas feature plush, rounded-edge sofas and chairs with soft textures that invite you to sink in and stay awhile. These aren't just beautiful pieces – they're designed for real living, real conversations, real moments with family and friends.

Above, dramatic spherical pendant lights and strategically placed LED recessed lighting create layers of illumination that can shift the mood from bright and energizing during the day to intimate and cozy in the evening. The lighting design doesn't just illuminate spaces; it sculpts them, adding depth and drama to every gathering.

Dining & Kitchen Experience

The dining area centers around an elegant oval white table surrounded by minimalist chairs that capture the essence of Scandinavian modern design – clean, functional, and effortlessly stylish. This isn't formal dining that intimidates; it's a space that welcomes both intimate family meals and larger gatherings with equal grace.

The kitchen island and accompanying bar stools transform cooking from a chore into a social experience. Whether you're preparing a quiet breakfast or hosting a dinner party, the design encourages interaction and connection. The thoughtful integration of warm wood cladding against the predominantly white surfaces adds just the right amount of natural warmth, preventing the space from feeling stark or cold.

This is a kitchen designed for real life – beautiful enough for entertaining, practical enough for everyday living.

Private Retreats

The bedrooms continue the hotel-inspired luxury theme, with carefully selected headboards and linens that create an immediate sense of refined comfort. These aren't just places to sleep – they're personal sanctuaries designed for true rest and rejuvenation.

The master suite takes luxury to the next level with a bathtub elegantly integrated into the bedroom space itself. This bold design choice creates an immediate spa-like atmosphere, blurring the lines between sleeping, bathing, and relaxation into one seamless experience of personal indulgence.

Wellness & Mindfulness

Perhaps most uniquely, the villa features a dedicated wellness room that serves as a yoga and meditation sanctuary. Large mirrors amplify the natural light and sense of space, while a golden-toned Buddha statue provides a focal point for contemplation. The abundance of natural light streaming through oversized windows creates an authentic "zen" atmosphere that supports both physical practice and mental clarity.

This villa in Alanya represents more than just luxury living – it's a thoughtfully designed environment that supports both social connection and personal well-being, where every detail has been considered to create a home that's as beautiful as it is livable.

Outdoor Living with a Hawaiian Spirit

Step outside, and the property continues to impress.

  • Infinity Pool– Positioned to capture the full panorama of the Mediterranean and Alanya Castle, with glass barriers ensuring the view remains uninterrupted.

  • Garden Design– Inspired by tropical aesthetics, it combines palm trees, bright flowers, and lush greenery to create a feeling reminiscent of Hawaii.

  • Outdoor Shower for Two– A detail that blends practicality with indulgence, adding to the villa’s spa-like identity.

Every inch of outdoor space is crafted to extend living beyond the villa’s walls, ensuring both relaxation and activity are always at hand.

Outdoors with a Hawaiian Spirit

Step outside, and the property continues to impress.

  • Infinity Pool– Positioned to capture the full panorama of the Mediterranean and Alanya Castle, with glass barriers ensuring the view remains uninterrupted.

  • Garden Design– Inspired by tropical aesthetics, it combines palm trees, bright flowers, and lush greenery to create a feeling reminiscent of Hawaii.

  • Pavilion and Outdoor Kitchen– A fully equipped space for summer evenings, complete with fireplace for gatherings that last into the night.

  • Sports Facilities– A private badminton and floorball court brings recreation literally to your doorstep.

  • Outdoor Shower for Two– A detail that blends practicality with indulgence, adding to the villa’s spa-like identity.

 

Every inch of outdoor space is crafted to extend living beyond the villa’s walls, ensuring both relaxation and activity are always at hand.

Luxury Estate Turkey – Your Partner in Exclusive Living

At Luxury Estate Turkey, we know that purchasing a property like Villa Infinity is about more than square meters and features. It is about trust, guidance, and making a life-changing decision with confidence.

  • Expertise in Luxury Segment– We specialize in properties that stand apart, guiding buyers through exclusive options.

  • Full Legal Support– From residence permits to citizenship applications, we manage the entire legal journey.

  • After-Sales Commitment– Property management, rental services, and long-term support ensure your villa continues to deliver value and comfort.

  • Tailored Experience– Our team listens to your goals and designs a property journey to match.

  • Inspection Trips– For international buyers, we arrange personalized visits so that decisions are made with clarity and confidence.

 

Choosing Villa Infinity is about choosing a new standard of living in Alanya.Choosing us means having a reliable partner to secure that future.

This is Villa Infinity: a home that doesn’t just provide walls and roofs but orchestrates an entire way of life. With its wellness floor, panoramic terraces, Hawaiian-inspired gardens, and seamless smart home technology, it represents not only the best of Alanya but the best of contemporary living.

Architectural character and first impressions

This luxury villa in Turkey does not hide its ambition. From the moment you approach the gated entrance, the geometry of the building signals confidence: clean lines, generous terraces, and a south–east–west orientation that maximizes sunlight and view corridors. The 520 m² plot allows the villa to breathe; garden spaces surround the pool while wide balconies extend each floor outward.

Glass dominates the façade, yet stone and warm textures ground the design. The infinity pool merges visually with the horizon, producing that magical effect of swimming directly into the Mediterranean. During the day, the water reflects blue skies; at sunset, it becomes a mirror of the glowing coastline.

Inside, the open-plan living areas use marble flooring and recessed lighting to create a cool, airy feel. High ceilings and large surfaces of glass encourage the landscape to become part of the décor. Interior layout — 5 rooms designed for modern life

  • Kitchen and dining:Designed for both everyday meals and social evenings. The layout supports white goods, ample storage, and a central island. Moreover, the dining zone benefits from sliding doors that open to the terrace, so meals naturally spill outdoors.

  • Bedrooms:Each room offers space for rest with access to views. The master suite includes a dressing room, modern en-suite bathroom, and a balcony overlooking both sea and mountains.

  • Bathrooms:Multiple units finished with marble and modern fittings. Private Turkish bath and sauna facilities transform the villa into a wellness retreat.

  • Flexibility:One of the five rooms easily becomes a study, gym, or media room. As a result, the villa adapts to changing lifestyles.

Wellness and leisure — private luxury facilities

This villa transforms daily living into a resort experience. Beyond the infinity pool, you enjoy a private Turkish bath, sauna, and even a mini bar near the outdoor sitting areas. The flow of space encourages relaxation: after a swim, you pass directly to the terrace for drinks, or step into the sauna before cooling down under the night sky.

Barbecue areas, shaded sitting corners, and open terraces provide variety for gatherings. Children’s pool sections make family life easier, while adults appreciate the calm of the infinity edge. Consequently, every generation finds its rhythm here.

property_description:
Gold Bau 1 Villa in Mahmutlar – Prestigious 4 Room Luxury Villa with Private Pool

If you are searching for a high-end property that combines prestige, comfort, and investment potential, theGold Bau 1 Villa in Mahmutlardeserves your attention. With a generous living space of 313 m², a total of 4 rooms including 3 bedrooms and 1 living room with open kitchen, and a design that balances showpiece glamour with family practicality, this villa offers a Mediterranean lifestyle at its finest. Located just 900 meters from the beach, it provides the perfect blend of coastal proximity, mountain views, and private resort-style amenities.

Mahmutlar – A District Where Everyday Life Meets Holiday Spirit

Mahmutlar lies along the Alanya coastline, nestled between the Mediterranean Sea and the Taurus Mountains. It is one of Alanya’s most developed and expat-friendly districts, with a large international community that gives it a cosmopolitan yet relaxed atmosphere.

The district stretches for several kilometers, meaning you can find both lively areas with cafés, shops, and restaurants, as well as quieter zones closer to the mountains. Only 10 km from Alanya city center, Mahmutlar allows residents to enjoy peaceful daily life while remaining close to the vibrant social and commercial heart of Alanya.

Lifestyle Advantages in Mahmutlar

  • Beaches and Water Sports:Mahmutlar’s coastline offers sandy beaches perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports. Fishing is also popular along the piers and rocky spots.

  • Nature and Mountains:The Taurus foothills behind Mahmutlar invite residents to hike, picnic, or simply breathe in fresh mountain air.

  • Fitness and Wellness:The area offers gyms, hamams, yoga studios, and cycling routes, making it easy to lead a healthy lifestyle.

  • Shopping and Daily Conveniences:While YektaMall and Akdeniz Park shopping centers provide modern retail options, traditional butchers, bakeries, and hardware stores are scattered throughout the town. The Tuesday market (SalÄ± PazarÄ±) is a highlight for fresh produce and local goods.

  • Transport:Local minibuses and buses connect Mahmutlar with Alanya and KargÄ±cak every 10 minutes, while taxis are easily available throughout the district.

Consequently, Mahmutlar is a district that truly balances everyday practicality with holiday vibes. It’s no wonder that families, retirees, digital nomads, and investors are increasingly choosing this area for long-term living or vacation homes.

Architecture and Exterior of Gold Bau 1 Villa

From the outside, theGold Bau 1 Villamakes a strong statement. Its contemporary architecture features wide terraces, glass railings, and a balanced design that emphasizes both openness and privacy. The private garden with palm trees creates a holiday-like atmosphere, while the private swimming pool becomes the focal point of outdoor life.

The villa comes with:

  • Private Pool:Ideal for family relaxation and summer gatherings.

  • Terrace and Garden:Perfect for barbecues, sunbathing, or enjoying evening breezes.

  • Outdoor Kitchen:A “summer kitchen” near the pool adds convenience for outdoor dining.

  • Private Parking and Garage:Secure and practical for homeowners.

  • Security Features:24/7 camera system and caretaker support.

The outdoor area feels like a personal resort—whether you are hosting friends, spending time with family, or simply unwinding in privacy.

Interior Design – A Blend of Prestige and Comfort

Stepping inside, the first impression is one ofsparkle and elegance. The villa is not only a home to live in but also a space to showcase. It appeals strongly to buyers who want both prestige and comfort.

Living Room

The salon sets the tone immediately. A spacious sitting arrangement, crystal chandeliers, and flowing curtains create a luxurious and welcoming environment.The design says:“We are ready for guests at any time.”

The room balances glamour with usability. While it feels grand and impressive, it also provides cozy corners for family gatherings. The combination of traditional Turkish hospitality and modern design principles shines through in this space.

Kitchen

The kitchen is modern yet warm. Matte brown cabinets give depth and character, while a patterned backsplash adds individuality. The open-plan layout ensures family interaction while cooking. It’s easy to imagine starting the day here with an espresso, debating whether to spend the afternoon by the private pool or at the nearby beach.

Bedrooms

Each of the three bedrooms has a distinct personality:

  • Master Bedroom:Romantic and hotel-like, with wallpaper, curtains, and a refined aesthetic. Perfect for unwinding at the end of the day.

  • Second Bedroom:Darker and heavier in style, appealing to those who love minimalism with a classy edge.

  • Children’s Room:Playful and light, designed with family practicality in mind.

This variety means the villa accommodates different tastes and needs within one household, ensuring everyone feels at home.

Bathrooms and Wellness

Extra Rooms

The lower level includes a fitness, reflecting the homeowners’ commitment to an active lifestyle. It can serve as a gym, a recreation room for children, or even a home cinema.

Decorative Highlights

  • Lighting:Crystal chandeliers in the living room, soft lamps in the bedrooms, and modern spotlights throughout the villa.

  • Textures:A mix of glossy surfaces, warm textiles, and tasteful wallpapers.

  • Atmosphere:A combination of glamour and practicality, making the villa equally suitable for everyday living and prestigious entertaining.

Outdoor Living – Resort Feel at Home

The private pool area is surrounded by palm trees and designed for relaxation. A swing near the pool, the outdoor kitchen, and the spacious terrace make the garden the heart of summer life. Whether you’re hosting extended family, enjoying a quiet evening, or entertaining guests, this villa adapts seamlessly.

The villa’s outdoor design supports both large gatherings and intimate moments. It’s not just about owning a property—it’s about owning a lifestyle.

Location Advantages – Close to the Coast and City

Furthermore:

property_title: Panoramic Sea View Villa in Alanya with Private Pool
property_description:
There are homes that immediately tell their story the moment you step inside. This newly built 5 room villa in KargÄ±cak belongs to that category. With 250 m² of interior space, an elevated position that unlocks panoramic sea, city, and castle views, and a private pool nestled in its garden, it captures the essence of modern Mediterranean luxury.

The property sits just 1200 meters from the shoreline. That means you can enjoy morning swims at the beach or choose to spend afternoons in your own pool, surrounded by stone and wood textures that echo contemporary European design. At only two years old, the building offers all the reliability of modern construction while presenting the kind of architectural identity that stands out in Alanya’s dynamic real estate market. For families, investors, and international buyers searching for a villa for sale in Alanya that combines modern design with strategic value, this home provides exactly that blend.

Unlike smaller apartments in the city center, this villa offers room to breathe: five spacious bedrooms, large terraces with glass balustrades, and interiors finished with marble-effect flooring and neutral tones. Moreover, the villa’s orientation draws the views right into the living spaces, so you never feel disconnected from the Mediterranean horizon. Consequently, it becomes not just a property but a lifestyle platform where mornings, evenings, and even work-from-home hours gain an entirely different quality.

Exterior design — stone, wood, and glass in harmony

The façade sets the tone. Natural stone textures ground the structure, warm-toned wood claddings soften the modern lines, and wide glass panels stretch across walls to dissolve the boundary between interior and exterior. This balance creates a contemporary identity that still resonates with Mediterranean tradition.

Where many older homes hide views behind small windows, this villa celebrates them. Floor-to-ceiling glazing frames the sea and Alanya Castle from multiple angles, turning every room into a viewpoint. In addition, the clean lines of the balconies, edged with transparent glass, ensure that the panorama remains uninterrupted.

At night, carefully placed exterior lighting highlights textures and gives the home a resort-like glow. Guests arriving after sunset encounter not only a house but a statement of modern lifestyle.

Interior design — generous space and modern minimalism

Living areas

The main salon stretches wide, its glossy marble-look ceramic flooring amplifying natural light. Large glass panels open onto terraces, allowing gatherings to flow naturally between indoor and outdoor zones. The room’s neutral palette means future owners can choose their style: minimalistic furniture with clean lines, or more luxurious pieces in leather and velvet. Both approaches find harmony here because the finishes are flexible.

Kitchen

The kitchen embraces open-plan living. With provision for an island, it supports both social cooking and everyday family meals. Neutral cabinetry paired with warm wood accents adds balance, while wide countertops provide ample space for preparation. For international buyers accustomed to entertaining, this layout makes hosting easy. In addition, the open design ensures constant connection with the living room and terraces, so the chef never feels isolated.

Bedrooms

All four bedrooms are scaled generously, with oversized windows that frame mountain, sea, or castle views. Because the villa uses neutral wall and floor tones, these rooms act as blank canvases. Families can personalize them with bold colors, international buyers can bring in modern or classic furnishings, and investors preparing for rental can keep them sleek for universal appeal.

Bathrooms

With two full bathrooms and additional guest facilities, daily routines remain smooth even for larger households. Finishes emphasize clean lines, glossy surfaces, and contemporary fittings that combine durability with elegance.

Balconies and terraces

Each level connects to the outdoors. Balconies framed in glass expand the sense of space, while the main terrace becomes the true gathering point. Here you place outdoor sofas, dining sets, or even modern lounge chairs for sunset evenings. Because the view takes in both the city and the castle, this space holds equal appeal for quiet family moments and formal entertaining.

Outdoor life — pool and garden as extensions of the home

The private pool integrates seamlessly into the villa’s architecture. Surrounded by stone decking, it functions as both a leisure zone and a visual centerpiece. Palm planting and green strips soften the edges, while the possibility for personalized landscaping allows future owners to add citrus trees, Mediterranean shrubs, or minimalist Zen gardens.

For families, the garden becomes a safe play area, while for investors, it is a visual selling point for short-term rentals. Moreover, the pool remains in sight from the terrace and living areas, making supervision effortless. Barbecue facilities already exist, so hosting summer evenings becomes second nature.

Location — why KargÄ±cak attracts attention

KargÄ±cak has established itself as one of the most desirable districts of Alanya for modern villa living. Set east of the city center, it combines green hillsides with close sea access. Because the villa sits only 1200 meters from the shoreline, you can choose between a beach day and a private pool within minutes.

The area remains quieter than central Alanya, which appeals to buyers who want privacy without isolation. At the same time, daily needs are nearby: supermarkets, restaurants, and transport connections all serve the neighborhood. From here, reaching Alanya city takes only a short drive, while GazipaÅŸa Airport lies about 25 minutes away, a major advantage for international owners.

In addition, KargÄ±cak villas often attract investors precisely because of their location. Elevated plots grant panoramic views, yet infrastructure keeps life practical. This balance fuels strong rental potential and long-term appreciation.

Investment perspective

From an investment angle, this villa checks multiple boxes.

  • New construction (2 years old):Lower maintenance risk compared to older properties.

  • Generous size (250 m², 5 rooms):Meets demand from larger families and high-end tenants.

  • Private pool and modern design:Essential features for luxury holiday rentals.

  • Panoramic views (sea, castle, city, mountains):High visual impact that enhances marketing.

  • Proximity to sea (1200 m):Close enough for convenience, far enough for calm.

  • Cash payment – discount offer:Additional financial advantage for decisive buyers.

Consequently, whether you plan to use it personally or rent it seasonally, the villa maintains strong yield potential. Short-term luxury rentals in Alanya remain in demand among European and Middle Eastern tourists who value privacy, pools, and views. For long-term residents, the spacious plan and private garden make it a year-round home.

Lifestyle possibilities

  • Families relocating to Alanya:Each child has a room, parents enjoy private spaces, and shared areas encourage togetherness.

  • Retirees seeking comfort and views:Low-maintenance modern build with terraces to enjoy sunsets.

  • Holiday-home buyers:Balance between proximity to beaches and privacy of a villa.

  • Investors in luxury rentals:Strong marketing appeal thanks to pool, views, and contemporary finishes.

Why work with Luxury Estate Turkey

Buying a villa in Alanya is more than a transaction. It is an entry into a lifestyle, and our team ensures that path feels safe, clear, and rewarding.

  • Transparent advice:We analyze the market, compare alternatives, and help you decide with confidence.

  • Legal support:From title deed to habitation certificates, we guide you through paperwork.

  • After-sales services:From furnishing to landscaping, we stay involved after handover.

  • Multilingual communication:English, Russian, Arabic, and more — we speak your language.

  • Inspection trips:We arrange viewing schedules that focus only on relevant properties, saving you time.

With us, you do not just purchase property; you secure a lifestyle that suits your family, your future, and your investment goals.

This modern villa in KargÄ±cak blends contemporary architecture with timeless views. Its five rooms, private pool, and proximity to the sea answer both emotional and practical needs. For families, it becomes a permanent base. For investors, it creates steady demand. For holidaymakers, it offers a retreat worth returning to every season.

 

If you are searching for a villa for sale in Alanya that delivers both comfort and value, this property deserves to be on your list. Contact Luxury Estate Turkey to arrange a private viewing and discover firsthand how this KargÄ±cak villa can match your vision of Mediterranean living.

property_title: Direct Sea Access Apartment in Serenity Royal Beach
property_description:
Have you ever wondered what it feels like to own aproperty in Alanyawhere hotels once guarded every inch of the shoreline?

For decades, Oba’s Mediterranean coast was claimed almost entirely by hotels. Tourists enjoyed the beachfront; residents settled a few streets behind. Then came a rare shift — a three-star hotel was transformed intoSerenity Royal Beach, a residential complex that changed the rules. Suddenly, the dream of living directly on the seafront in Oba was no longer impossible.

This is not just another apartment in Alanya.It is a home built on one of the most privileged pieces of land in the region: seafront, with private beach access, concierge-style services, and amenities designed to rival high-end resorts. In a market where such opportunities simply do not exist, Serenity Royal Beach offers buyers both exclusivity and everyday comfort.

A Living Space That Redefines Elegance

Inside this 89 m² apartment, every detail speaks of sophistication. The layout includes two bedrooms and a spacious living room, creating a balanced home for both private retreat and social gatherings.

Flooring with Drama and Balance
The living room and corridors feature large marble-effect tiles, their polished surfaces catching the light and amplifying space. This glossy finish adds a theatrical sense of openness, setting the tone for luxury. In the bedrooms, designers chose warm wood-effect parquet, softening the mood and creating a tranquil retreat. Together, these choices reflect an intentional contrast: grandeur in shared spaces, calm in personal ones.

Ceiling Artistry and Lighting Ambiance
Ceilings are framed with linear LED strips, clean and modern, while chandeliers in crystal and gold tones act as focal points. These fixtures do more than illuminate; they cast decorative patterns of light across the room, turning illumination into art. Especially in the salon, the chandeliers serve as both lighting and sculptural presence.

A Kitchen with Its Own Personality
Forget standard layouts — here, cabinetry blends wood tones with white surfaces and geometric details. The marble backsplash mirrors the floor’s veining, tying the whole composition together. Functionality is high, but the look is boutique-hotel chic, elevating even the daily act of cooking.

Furniture and Arrangement
The current décor presents a Chesterfield-style cream sofa paired with black-and-gold tables, merging timeless elegance with contemporary edge. In the dining area, a round table and velvet chairs create a welcoming yet refined setting. Bedrooms continue the sophisticated rhythm, with dark-toned headboards, wall panels, and striking lighting that add depth and presence.

Details That Leave an Impression

Seafront Living with Everyday Resort Comfort

Serenity Royal Beach doesn’t stop at interiors. What sets this project apart is the lifestyle it enables. Built on land that almost no resident can access, it offers something unique:

Oba – Where Daily Life Flows with Ease

The apartment’s location in Oba reinforces its appeal. Known for its wide sandy beaches, palm-lined promenades, and blend of local life with modern conveniences, Oba is one of Alanya’s most comfortable areas for long-term living.

Residents enjoy:

Living here means never needing to compromise between relaxation and practicality. Everything essential is within reach, and everything enjoyable is within walking distance.

Who Will Feel Drawn to Serenity Royal Beach?

The seafront setting, private beach club, and on-site services create an atmosphere where everyday life feels like a holiday. For couples or families who value high living standards, this is a home that ensures both prestige and comfort.

Prestige-Oriented Buyers

A Rare Investment in Oba’s Real Estate Landscape

Serenity Royal Beach is not simply a home — it is an investment in rarity. With almost all of Oba’s seafront land occupied by hotels, projects like this will not appear again easily. That scarcity translates into long-term value.

property_title: Exceptional Seafront Apartment in Kucuker Seaside Residence Alanya
property_description:
Please picture this: you're having your morning coffee, and instead of staring at another apartment building, you're watching the sun dance across the Mediterranean while Alanya Castle stands guard in the distance. Sounds like something from a travel magazine, right? Well, this 165m² seafrontapartment for sale in AlanyaTosmur at Kucuker Sea Side Residence could make thatyour everyday reality.

You know how most beachfront properties claim to be "close to the sea" but you still need a five-minute walk to actually touch the water? Not here. This place sits directly on the coastline with its own private beach. When I say private, I mean you can literally roll out of bed and be swimming in the Mediterranean before you're fully awake. That's the kind of convenience that makes you wonder why you ever settled for anything less.

What Makes This Seafront Apartment for Sale in Alanya Tosmur Different?

Let's talk about location for a minute because honestly, it's everything in real estate. Tosmur isn't just another coastal neighborhood trying to ride on Alanya's reputation. This area has its own personality, and once you spend a day here, you'll understand whylocals guard it like a secret.

The Kucuker Sea Side Residence sits right where the Mediterranean meets sophisticated living. Not in some touristy strip where you're fighting crowds for a decent sunset photo, but in a spot where you get front-row seats to nature's daily show. We're talking about 300 days a year of spectacular sunsets that'll make your Instagram followers seriously question their life choices.

But here's what really sets this place apart - the Kucuker Sea Side Residence's design actually makes sense. The architects didn't just slap together another concrete box and call it luxury. They thought about how the light moves throughout the day, where the best views are, and how to make every room feel connected to that incredible sea view. Consequently, you're not stuck with one tiny window facing the water while the rest of your home feels like it could be anywhere.

Walking Through Your Potential New Home

The Living Spaces That Actually Live Well

Step inside, and you'll notice something immediately - this doesn't feel like a typical apartment. The designers went with a modern Scandinavian approach, which basically means everything looks effortlessly elegant without trying too hard. Think clean lines, natural materials, and colors that make you feel calm the moment you walk in.

The living and dining area flows together in that open-plan way that's become popular, but they did it right here. You're not left with one giant empty space that echoes when you talk. Instead, you get distinct areas that still feel connected. The big windows frame the sea view like it's a massive piece of artwork that changes throughout the day. Early morning, you get those soft golden tones. By evening, you're watching the sun paint the sky in colors that somehow look different every single day.

Moreover, the lighting system deserves a mention because someone clearly understood that harsh overhead lights kill any romantic dinner or relaxed evening vibe. The hidden LED strips in the ceiling provide gentle illumination that actually enhances the atmosphere instead of destroying it.

A Kitchen That Invites You to Actually Cook

Here's something refreshing - a kitchen designed by people who apparently cook. The L-shaped layout gives you enough counter space to prep a proper meal without feeling cramped. The white cabinets against dark countertops create that classic contrast that never goes out of style, plus everything stays looking clean and modern.

All the appliances are integrated, including the microwave and oven, which means no mismatched items cluttering up your space. If you're someone who loves to entertain, you'll appreciate how the kitchen connects to the living area without overwhelming it. You can prep dinner while chatting with guests, or whip up a quick breakfast while enjoying your sea view.

Therefore, whether you're a serious cook or someone who mostly reheats takeout, this kitchen works for your lifestyle. The best part? Everything comes included, so you can start using it immediately instead of spending months hunting for the right appliances.

The Amenities That Make Hotel Living Seem Basic

Water, Water Everywhere

Let's be honest - most apartment complexes promise great amenities and deliver a small, overcrowded pool that's more chlorine than water. Not here. You get both indoor and outdoor pools, which means you canswim year-round regardless of the weather outside.

The outdoor pool area feels like something from a resort. You're surrounded by professionally landscaped gardens with the Mediterranean as your backdrop. Meanwhile, the indoor pool gives you that option for cooler days or when you want a more private swimming experience. Both pools are maintained by professional staff, so you're always diving into clean, properly treated water.

For families, there's a dedicated children's pool area where kids can splash safely while parents relax nearby. It's those thoughtful touches that show someone actually planned this complex for real people, not just photo opportunities.

Wellness Without the Membership Fees

The fitness center includes modern equipment that actually gets maintained and replaced when needed. No more hoping that treadmill doesn't break down mid-workout or finding out the air conditioning stopped working three weeks ago.

But here's where things get interesting - this place includes a traditional Turkish bath and sauna. If you've never experienced a proper Turkish bath, you're in for something special. It's not just about getting clean; it's a whole relaxation ritual that leaves you feeling renewed. Additionally, there's a dedicated massage room where you can book professional treatments without leaving the complex.

Furthermore, the outdoor areas include barbecue facilities and comfortable seating areas throughout the landscaped gardens. Sunday afternoon barbecues with friends become effortless when everything you need is right there.

Tosmur: The Neighborhood That Locals Don't Want Tourists to Discover

Dim River: Nature's Air Conditioning

You know how every coastal town claims to have something special? Tosmur actually delivers with the Dim River. This isn't some muddy stream pretending to be a natural attraction. We're talking about crystal-clear mountain water that stays refreshingly cool even during the hottest summer days.

The river area has become a local gathering spot where families set up picnics under the trees while kids splash in the natural pools. There are family-run restaurants along the riverbank serving authentic Turkish dishes that haven't been modified for tourist palates. When you want something more active, there's even a go-kart track for some friendly competition.

Therefore, living in Tosmur means you get both the Mediterranean sea and mountain river experiences without choosing between them. Hot summer day? Cool off in the river. Want to swim in salt water? The private beach is steps from your door.

Shopping That Feels Like Community

Forget fighting crowds at massive shopping malls. Tosmur operates on a more human scale. The neighborhood has multiple supermarkets competing for your business, which means better prices and fresher products. Local butchers and produce vendors know their customers and take pride in what they offer.

Thursday brings the weekly market, which transforms into something like Istanbul's Grand Bazaar but without the aggressive tourist targeting. You'll find fresh produce, household goods, clothing, and cosmetics all in one place. Moreover, it's where you start recognizing faces and becoming part of the community rather than just another foreign resident.

Meanwhile, everything stays within walking distance. Need groceries? Five-minute walk. Want fresh bread? Three minutes. Pharmacy? Right around the corner. It's the kind of convenience that makes car ownership optional rather than essential for daily life.

Getting Around: Easier Than You'd Expect

Airport Access That Actually Makes Sense

One of the smartest things about choosing this seafront apartment for sale in Alanya Tosmur is the transportation situation. Gazipasa Airport sits just 45 kilometers away, which means your international guests don't need to endure a grueling journey to reach you. Antalya Airport, while further at 125 kilometers, remains completely manageable for those who prefer more flight options.

But here's the real convenience - bus connections run frequently throughout the day to Alanya center and other popular areas. The bus stops are literally on every corner, so you're never walking more than a couple of minutes to catch public transport. Additionally, the buses are clean, air-conditioned, and operated by professional drivers who actually follow schedules.

Furthermore, when you do want to explore beyond Tosmur, places like Kestel, Oba, and Cikcilli are all nearby, each with their own character and attractions. You get variety without the hassle of long-distance travel.

The Investment Side Nobody Talks About Honestly

Rental Income That Actually Materializes

Let's cut through the typical investment property nonsense you usually hear. Yes, this seafront apartment for sale in Alanya Tosmur can generate rental income, but let's talk realistic numbers and expectations.

Properties with private beach access and genuine sea views command premium rates because they offer something most rentals can't match - exclusivity. Your guests aren't just renting an apartment; they're renting a lifestyle experience. The resort-style amenities mean they don't need to hunt for pools, gyms, or entertainment options elsewhere.

However, success in the rental market requires proper management, competitive pricing, and maintaining high standards. The property comes fully furnished and move-in ready, which eliminates your initial setup costs and accelerates your ability to start generating income.

Long-term Value: The Uncomfortable Truth

Waterfront properties with private beach access are becoming increasingly rare along developed coastlines worldwide. While I can't promise specific appreciation rates, simple supply and demand suggests that scarcity creates value over time.

Turkey's continued infrastructure investments in the region, including airport improvements and highway connections, enhance accessibility and attract more international interest. Meanwhile, Alanya's evolution from seasonal resort destination to year-round living location supports sustained property demand.

But honestly? Buy this place because you want to live this lifestyle, not because you're chasing investment returns. If the numbers work out long-term, consider it a bonus rather than the primary motivation.

Security and Management That Actually Functions

Protection That Goes Beyond Cameras

The 24/7 security system includes trained personnel who actually pay attention, not just someone sitting behind a desk playing on their phone. The camera coverage monitors common areas and entry points, while door security systems ensure only authorized individuals access the building.

Professional caretakers handle maintenance requests, coordinate deliveries, and provide assistance with various resident needs. They're the people who make sure the elevator actually works, the pool stays clean, and small problems get fixed before becoming big headaches.

Additionally, backup generator systems maintain power during outages, which unfortunately happen occasionally in any developing area. You're not left in the dark or stuck between floors when the local grid has issues.

Move-in Ready: No Hidden Surprises

Everything Included, Seriously

This seafront apartment for sale in Alanya Tosmur comes completely furnished with pieces selected to complement the modern design. We're not talking about cheap furniture that looks good in photos but falls apart after six months. These are quality pieces chosen by people who understand both style and durability.

The white goods package includes all major appliances - refrigerator, washing machine, dishwasher, and cooking equipment. Kitchen items, cookware, and basic household supplies mean you can prepare meals immediately rather than spending weeks shopping for essentials.

Bedroom linens, towels, and bathroom accessories complete the package. Essentially, you can arrive with your personal belongings and start living comfortably from day one. No assembly required, no compatibility issues, no unexpected additional expenses.

Why Work with Luxury Estate Turkey: The Honest Answer

Look, choosing a real estate agent for international property purchases isn't just about who has the nicest website or makes the biggest promises. You need someone who understands the actual process, not just the marketing side of things.

Our experience inTurkish marketmeans we've seen the mistakes other buyers make and can help you avoid them. We understand visa requirements, financing options, property management realities, and the legal processes that protect your investment. Moreover, we maintain relationships with reliable local service providers, contractors, and management companies that continue supporting you after purchase.

We don't promise unrealistic returns or paint everything in perfect colors. Instead, we provide honest assessments of both opportunities and challenges, helping you make informed decisions based on accurate information rather than sales pressure.

Our multilingual team communicates clearly with international clients while maintaining strong connections with Turkish professionals and government offices. When problems arise - and they occasionally do with any international property purchase - we have the local knowledge and relationships to resolve issues efficiently.

Furthermore, we're here for the long term. Whether you need rental management assistance, property maintenance coordination, or simply advice about living in Turkey,Luxury Estate Turkeyremain available to support your ongoing relationship with your Turkish property investment.

That's the difference between working with people who care about your long-term success versus those who disappear after closing day.

property_title: Panoramic Villa in Alanya with Sea, Castle, and City Views
property_description:
Imagine stepping into your living room and being greeted by uninterrupted views that stretch from the Mediterranean Sea to Alanya Castle, across the green slopes of the Taurus Mountains, and over the lively city below. This villa in KargÄ±cak captures that panorama from almost every angle, thanks to its clever orientation toward the south, west, and north. Light enters through wide windows, terraces extend the rooms outdoors, and every moment of the day feels connected to the scenery.

Unlike many standard villas for sale in Alanya, this property offers much more than square meters and furniture. It belongs to Toros 3 Villas, a well-established residential site known for its landscaped gardens, large pools, aqua park, and reliable security. Yet the villa maintains its independence with a private garden, its own garage, a sauna, and a dressing room. As a result, you enjoy both the advantages of community facilities and the privacy of your own home.

With five full bedrooms, five bathrooms, an American-style kitchen, and 220 m² of interior space, the villa meets the needs of large families, long-stay residents, and investors looking for rental-ready opportunities. Moreover, its full furnishings and neutral décor make it immediately livable, while still leaving room for personal touches.

Layout and interior design — a balance of classic and modern

The villa spreads across three floors, creating clear separation between social and private zones. The ground floor is designed for gatherings, the middle and upper levels provide quiet bedrooms, and the rooftop terraces crown the experience with breathtaking views.

Living room — panoramic stage for daily life

The salon stands out with large windows that bring the sea and city skyline inside. Cream and beige tones dominate the furniture, supporting the scenery without competing with it. Classic details such as the ceiling’s decorative moldings add a sense of tradition, while glass coffee tables and lighter accessories balance it with a modern note. This interplay of styles ensures the interior feels warm and elegant rather than heavy.

Kitchen and dining

The American kitchen links easily to the dining zone, so conversations flow naturally while meals are prepared. White cabinets and functional appliances keep the atmosphere bright, while neutral flooring continues the light theme. Families who value separate cooking spaces will find the arrangement practical, especially when hosting larger groups.

Bedrooms

The main bedroom enjoys direct access to a terrace, turning morning routines into a peaceful ritual with fresh air and wide views. Furnishings remain modern and streamlined, with plenty of wardrobe space. Other bedrooms are simpler in décor, ready for customization by children, guests, or a home office. Each room benefits from natural light, and with five bathrooms available, comfort remains uninterrupted even when the villa is full.

Sauna, storage, and dressing room

Luxury touches set this property apart. A private sauna encourages wellness at home, while the dedicated dressing room adds both functionality and prestige. The extra storage space ensures the villa feels uncluttered even during longer stays.

Balconies and terraces

The villa’s terraces form a continuous link between indoor and outdoor living. Rattan seating, a built-in barbecue area, and wide surfaces for evening dinners create spaces where daily life merges with leisure. The largest terrace becomes an outdoor living room, perfect for long summer evenings with family and friends.

Outdoor life — private garden and site facilities

In addition to the private garden and garage, the villa benefits from the broader facilities of Toros 3 Villas. Residents share landscaped gardens, children’s play areas, and several swimming pools, including an aqua park pool for families. Fitness rooms, meeting spaces, and gazebos add variety, while 24/7 security and camera systems provide peace of mind.

Your own garden remains distinct, with enough space for outdoor dining, potted plants, or simple landscaping according to taste. The garage offers secure parking, and the barbecue area becomes a natural focal point for gatherings.

Technical details that support comfort

  • 220 m² interior

  • 5 rooms and 5 bathrooms

  • Full furnishings included

  • American kitchen

  • Sauna, dressing room, storage area

  • South, west, and north orientation

  • Private garden and garage

  • Three floors with balconies and terraces

  • Part of Toros 3 Villa complex with pools, aqua park, gym, and security

  • Only 1 km from the sea

  • High rental yield potential

Location — KargÄ±cak’s unique mix of nature and convenience

KargÄ±cak lies just east of Alanya, close enough to reach the city center within 15 minutes yet far enough to enjoy peace and cleaner air. The area is known for its rolling hills, pine forests, and expansive Mediterranean views. From this villa, you look not only to the sea but also across to Alanya Castle and the surrounding mountains.

Shops, markets, and daily services remain close, while beaches are only a kilometer away. Public transport and main roads make access easy, whether heading into Alanya or toward GazipaÅŸa Airport, which sits just 28 km away. For families and retirees alike, KargÄ±cak offers the blend of calm and accessibility that defines comfortable Mediterranean living.

Investment perspective — why this villa stands out

Searches for “sea view villa in Turkey” or “villa for sale in Alanya” often lead to crowded developments or projects still under construction. This villa is already complete, furnished, and ready to use. Its panoramic views, private amenities, and site facilities make it highly attractive on both long- and short-term rental markets.

  • High yield:Families and groups prefer villas with pools and panoramic views over standard apartments, allowing higher rental pricing.

  • Resale value:The combination of sea, castle, mountain, and city views ensures strong appeal for future buyers.

  • Ready-to-live:Fully furnished with renovated utilities, reducing initial investment costs.

  • Community and privacy:A rare balance of shared site benefits and personal independence.

Who this villa suits best

  • Families seeking full-time living:With 5 rooms, 5 bathrooms, and functional extras, the villa meets the needs of larger households.

  • Foreign investors:Especially from Europe and the Middle East, where demand for panoramic villas with rental potential remains strong.

  • Retirees:Those who value quiet surroundings, proximity to nature, and access to city conveniences.

  • Lifestyle buyers:Anyone dreaming of breakfast on a terrace with castle views and evenings by the pool.

Style and lifestyle potential

Decorative elements keep the interior warm but neutral, giving buyers flexibility to adapt. Add Mediterranean textiles, lighter curtains, or modern lighting to emphasize the views even more. Outdoor spaces invite rattan furniture, potted citrus trees, and subtle lighting for summer nights. The villa adapts equally well to traditional family living or holiday-style arrangements.

Why partner with Luxury Estate Turkey

Buying a villa in Alanya is more than a property decision; it is a lifestyle step. We support you from the first viewing to long after the purchase is complete.

  • Clear market advice:Honest comparisons so you understand value.

  • Legal security:Assistance with title deed, habitation certificate, and residency applications.

  • Residency and citizenship guidance:If your investment aims include Turkish residency or citizenship, we provide the roadmap.

  • After-sales care:From furniture sourcing to rental management, our team remains by your side.

  • Multilingual communication:Guidance in your language so every step feels transparent.

  • Inspection trips:Tailored visits so you see the right properties in limited time.

Our promise is simple: clarity, honesty, and full support.

Final invitation

This panoramic sea view villa in KargÄ±cak is not just a house — it is a stage for Mediterranean living. With its five rooms, private garden, sauna, dressing room, and full furnishings, it provides everything a family or investor could need. Moreover, the Toros 3 Villas complex adds pools, aqua park, fitness areas, and 24/7 security, making life both luxurious and practical.

 

If you are searching for a villa for sale in Alanya that blends panoramic scenery with privacy, community facilities, and high rental potential, this property is worth your attention. Contact us today to schedule a private viewing or to arrange an inspection trip. Let us help you make this villa your gateway to a lifestyle defined by sunshine, sea, and security.

A hammock area under the trees encourages slow afternoons. Children find space to play safely, and adults enjoy quiet corners for reading or working outdoors.

The private pool sits at the center of this lifestyle. Morning swims, evening cool-offs, and weekend gatherings all revolve around it. Because the pool is framed by stone paving, maintenance remains practical. Next to it, a barbecue corner invites summer meals that stretch into the night.

To modernize, one could opt for monochrome upholstery and minimalist décor. Regardless, the space works well for both family gatherings and guest entertainment.

The villa currently balances classic and modern. Traditional patterned furniture mixes with bold, modern kitchen colors. This hybrid character gives the house authenticity, but small updates could align it with luxury market expectations. Neutralizing the kitchen cabinetry, simplifying wall décor, and layering modern textiles would position it as a contemporary Mediterranean villa without losing local charm.

Weekly markets supply fresh local produce, while supermarkets and shops meet daily needs. Cafés and restaurants along the coastline range from casual Turkish grills to international kitchens.

Transport is easy. Minibuses connect KonaklÄ± to Alanya center in about 15 minutes, and Antalya Airport is reachable within an hour and a half. Families appreciate the schools and healthcare options nearby. Moreover, KonaklÄ± remains less crowded than central Alanya, which makes it a favorite for those who want residential calm with city convenience.

property_title: Historic Stone House in Alanya Castle Area with Full Sea View
property_description:
This is not your typical modern residence. Tucked into the historicTophane area near Alanya Castle, just 200 meters from the sea, stands a 140 m² stone house that carries the soul of the city itself. With thick stone walls, handcrafted woodwork, and windows opening directly to the Mediterranean, this home feels like stepping into another time — while still giving you everything you need for modern living. It’s a rare opportunity: a property with character, fullsea view, and eligibility for aresidence permit in Turkey.

Interior – Tradition and Warmth Combined

Walking inside, the house reveals the charm of a true Alanya classic:

  • Living Atmosphere: Natural wood dominates the interiors — ceilings, doors, window frames, even the kitchen cabinets. This brings warmth and authenticity, while traditional star-pattern details in the ceilings reference old Turkish houses.

  • Windows & Light: With openings to three directions, the house captures views of Alanya harbor and the sea, making every corner feel alive with light and scenery.

  • Kitchen: Small but practical, the kitchen combines rustic woodwork with modern functionality, blending old and new seamlessly.

  • Bedrooms: Spacious and bright, where white walls meet warm wood details to reflect light naturally.

  • Balcony: The strongest point of the home. From here, you watch the lighthouse and the Mediterranean spread out in front of you — turning ordinary mornings into a daily ritual of beauty.

This is not an apartment with standard finishes; it’s a stone house that carries history, offering a lifestyle that feels both grounded and inspiring.

Who Will Love This Home?

  • History and culture enthusiasts: Living within walking distance of Alanya Castle, inside a UNESCO-protected heritage zone, is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

  • Foreign buyers: Withresidence permit eligibility, it’s an ideal choice for those looking to settle in Turkey with character and charm.

  • Boutique lifestyle seekers: Perfect for those who prefer independent, soulful living over large residential complexes.

  • Investors: High rental potential thanks to the historic setting and proximity to touristic landmarks.

  • Artists and creatives: The views, atmosphere, and historic soul make this house a constant source of inspiration.

Location – Alanya Castle and Tophane

Alanya Castle rises above the peninsula, dividing the city into east and west. Tophane, on its slopes, remains a peaceful area surrounded by ancient walls, narrow paths, and breathtaking views. Unlike busier districts, the atmosphere here is calm, with only a few small markets and family-run restaurants. For daily needs you may sometimes walk down to the city center — which is close enough to reach on foot or by bus.

Highlights of the area:

  • Historic importance: The 13th-century Alanya Castle is UNESCO-protected. Walking among the old walls is a daily reality here.

  • Cable car access: From the castle, the cable car quickly connects you to Kleopatra Beach.

  • Nearby attractions: Red Tower, the ancient shipyard, and DamlataÅŸ Cave are within reach.

  • Local dining: Small cafés and restaurants in the castle district serve traditional breakfasts and romantic dinners with stunning views.

  • Transportation: The No. 4 bus runs regularly until evening, and taxis are always available. Walking paths with steps and slopes give you the option of a scenic climb.

AtLuxury Estate Turkey, we specialize in unique homes that tell a story. This stone house is more than an investment; it’s a lifestyle rooted in history. With our transparent guidance, multilingual support, and local expertise, we help you secure a property that truly fits your vision — whether for living, investing, or building your life in Alanya.

property_title: Seafront Residence Permit Eligible Apartment in Alanya
property_description:
Seafront Apartment for Sale in Alanya – Residence Permit Eligible with Castle & Sea Views

Let's be honest – how many times have you scrolled through social media, seen someone's beachfront breakfast photo, and thought "I need that life"? Well, here's your chance to stop double-tapping and start living. This stunning4 room seafront apartment in Alanya, Tosmurisn't just a property in Turkey; it's your ticket to becoming that person whose Instagram makes everyone else slightly jealous.

Picture this: you wake up naturally (no more brutal alarm clocks, thank you very much) to Mediterranean sunlight streaming through your windows. Your morning routine? A leisurely stroll to your floor-to-ceiling windows where the turquoise sea greets you like an old friend. And yes, that's Alanya Castle in the distance – because apparently your new life comes with its own medieval backdrop. Talk about living the dream!

This isn't your typical apartment viewing where you need to imagine away the previous owner's questionable wallpaper choices. At 160 m² of pure coastal elegance, this place comes fully furnished with taste that would make interior design magazines weep with joy. 

Now, let's talk about that south and southwest orientation – and no, this isn't boring real estate jargon. This means your home is basically a solar panel for happiness. Golden hour lighting? You've got it from sunrise to sunset. Those moody, perfectly lit selfies? They're happening whether you try or not. Your friends back home dealing with grey skies will be asking for your secret, and you can casually mention, "Oh, it's just the Mediterranean lifestyle."

Here's where things get really exciting: this area is open for residence permits. Translation? You can actually make this paradise your permanent address. Whether you're a savvy investor who knows a good thing when you see it, or someone ready to trade the daily grind for daily beach walks, this property opens doors – quite literally – to your new Turkish adventure.

And can we talk about the location for a moment? "Front beach line" isn't just marketing speak – it means you could theoretically roll out of bed, stumble outside, and have your toes in Mediterranean sand before your coffee finishes brewing. Your morning commute becomes a beach walk. Your evening entertainment is watching the sunset paint the sky while waves provide the soundtrack.

Interior Design – Classic Mediterranean with a Country Touch

The overall design blendsclassic Mediterranean charmwith subtlecountry-style elements. Light-colored furniture, cream-toned sofas, wooden textures, and a natural stone fireplace create a warm and inviting atmosphere. The interior palette leans on cream, beige, soft yellow, and olive green—colors that not only feel timeless but also harmonize with the coastal surroundings.

Living Room – Comfort Framed by Views

The living room is designed for both social gatherings and quiet relaxation. Chesterfield-style sofas with rounded arms and button tufting add a note of sophistication. Delicate floral motifs in the upholstery bring a touch of nostalgia without overpowering the space.

The seating is arranged in a U-shape by the windows, allowing everyone to enjoy conversation while gazing at the endless blue. In one corner, a stone-clad fireplace stands as both a focal point and a practical feature, perfect for cozy winter evenings.

Curtains combine light cream on the upper panels with olive green on the lower, paired with sheer drapes to frame the large windows and enhance the perception of height. Daylight streams in freely, while classic chandelier lighting offers a soft, ambient glow after sunset.

Balconies and Terraces – Extending the Living Space

Generous balconies open directly to the sea, providing the ideal setting for breakfast with the sunrise, leisurely afternoon reading, or sunset dinners. Rattan-style outdoor furniture adds natural texture, with pale yellow cushions that echo the indoor palette.

One balcony features a small built-in stone barbecue—an inviting spot for summer evenings with friends and family.

Kitchen – Rustic Warmth with Everyday Functionality

The kitchen embraces a warm, rustic style. Light cream cabinetry with framed doors and matte glass inserts pairs beautifully with a classic ceramic backsplash. A round glass dining table with bamboo chairs brings a casual, summer-home feel. The space is highly functional, offering plenty of storage and a relaxed breakfast area.

Bedrooms – Calm and Minimal

Bedrooms follow a minimalist approach for restful comfort. Neutral tones and uncluttered layouts allow for personalization. A few decorative updates—such as new artwork, bed linens, or accent rugs—could instantly infuse more character while keeping the peaceful vibe intact.

Living Experience – A Home for All Seasons

Owning this apartment means living with the sea as your constant backdrop. Mornings begin with coffee on the balcony as fishing boats pass by. Evenings can be spent hosting friends around the barbecue or watching the sunset from the living room.

In cooler months, the fireplace becomes the heart of the home, offering warmth while waves roll in outside. The interior’s classic design ensures it never feels dated, while small modern touches could adapt it easily to personal taste.

Location – Tosmur's Unique Coastal Charm (The Best Kept Secret of Alanya)

Here's a little secret that real estate agents don't always shout about: while everyone's fighting overproperties in central Alanya, the smart money has been quietly discovering Tosmur. Located just east of the main hustle and bustle, this serene coastal district is like finding a hidden gem that somehow escaped the tourist guidebook frenzy – and honestly, that's exactly what makes it so special.

The star of the show here? The magnificentDimçay River, which isn't just another pretty water feature on your Instagram feed. Come summer, this becomes your personal oasis where the temperature drops a blessed few degrees, and suddenly you understand why locals have been keeping this place to themselves. Picture yourself dining at one of the charming riverside restaurants, your feet dangling in cool mountain water while you feast on fresh trout – yes, this is actually your neighborhood now, not just a weekend getaway.

But let's talk about those riverside restaurants for a moment, because they're not your typical tourist traps. These family-run establishments have been perfecting their recipes for generations, serving meals on platforms built right over the flowing water. The sound of the river becomes your dinner music, and the natural air conditioning means you can actually enjoy a hot meal without melting. Some places even have those traditional Turkish wooden platforms where you can lounge like royalty after lunch. And for the kids (or the young at heart), there are go-kart tracks that add just the right amount of adrenaline to your lazy river day.

Now, here's where Tosmur gets really clever about daily living. Forget about those suburban nightmares where you need a car to buy milk. Everything you need for everyday life is within an easy stroll – supermarkets that stock both Turkish essentials and international favorites, butchers who know their craft, greengrocers bursting with produce so fresh it was probably picked that morning. But the real treat? The bustling Thursday market that transforms the streets into a sensory adventure of fresh produce, warm börek straight from the oven, olives that taste like sunshine, and those random household items you didn't know you needed until you saw them at unbeatable prices.

The beauty of Tosmur's compact layout means you can literally walk everywhere without breaking a sweat (well, maybe a little sweat – it is the Mediterranean, after all). Your daily routine becomes a pleasant neighborhood stroll rather than a logistical challenge. But when you do want to venture beyond your peaceful bubble, public buses practically stop at your doorstep, whisking you off to explore other corners of Alanya. Fancy some shopping in Oba? Fifteen minutes. Want to check out the nightlife in Kestel? Twenty minutes. Feel like exploring the newer developments in Cikcilli? Half an hour max. You get the best of both worlds – tranquil residential living with the entire Alanya region as your extended backyard.

The dining scene here deserves its own love letter. Family-run restaurants where the grandmother still makes the bread by hand, serving authentic Turkish dishes that would make your Turkish friends nod in approval. But this isn't some isolated village – you'll also find eateries with European menus for those nights when you're craving something familiar. The best part? Prices that won't make your wallet weep, because you're living where locals eat, not where tour buses stop.

And for those days when you want to add a touch of adventure to your routine,Dim Caveawaits just a short drive up into the Taurus Mountains. This isn't just any cave – it's one of Turkey's largest public caves, a natural wonder that stays a cool 18°C year-round. Imagine telling friends back home that your weekend plans include exploring underground cathedrals carved by nature over millions of years. The drive up is an adventure in itself, winding through pine forests and mountain villages where time seems to move at a more civilized pace.

What really sets Tosmur apart is this perfect balance it strikes. You're close enough to central Alanya to enjoy all the amenities and entertainment of a major resort town, yet far enough away to escape the crowds and noise when you want to. You get to live like a local while still having access to everything that made you fall in love with the Turkish Riviera in the first place. It's sophisticated without being pretentious, convenient without being commercial, and peaceful without being boring.

This is the kind of place where you'll find yourself becoming a regular at the local bakery, where the bus drivers wave when they see you, and where summer evenings are spent watching the sunset reflect off the river while planning which riverside restaurant to try next. Tosmur doesn't just offer you a place to live – it offers you a community, a lifestyle, and a daily dose of that particular Turkish warmth that makes every day feel just a little bit magical.

Building and Community Features of the Residence

This well-maintained beachfront complex offers:

  • 24/7 camera securityfor peace of mind

  • On-site caretakerensuring daily maintenance

  • Cable TV-satellite infrastructure

  • Open car parkfor residents

  • Directfront beach line access

  • Location in anarea open for residence permits

Investment Potential – High Returns and Added Benefits

Properties in Alanya with direct sea frontage are in high demand, both for holiday rentals and long-term stays. This apartment’s size, location, and residence permit eligibility give it a competitive edge.

Fully furnished and move-in ready, it requires no additional investment to start generating rental income. The combination of Alanya Castle views and immediate beach access allows for premium rental rates, while the growing popularity of Tosmur ensures strong future appreciation.

Your Trusted Partner – Luxury Estate Turkey

Purchasing property abroad should be a secure and seamless experience. AtLuxury Estate Turkey, we provide:

  • Local Expertise– Detailed market knowledge to guide your decision.

  • Legal Security– Full support with title deeds, contracts, and due diligence.

  • Residency and Citizenship Assistance– Helping you obtain Turkish residence permits or citizenship when eligible.

  • After-Sales Support– From furnishing to property management.

  • Flexible Purchase Solutions– Including property trade-in options.

Our mission is to ensure your investment is not only safe but also profitable and stress-free.

Planning a Trip to Turkey?Perfect timing! We'll arrange an exclusive in-person tour where you can walk through every room, test out that morning coffee routine on the terrace, and maybe even time it so you catch one of those legendary Mediterranean sunsets from your potential new living room. property_title: Modern Family Home in Alanya Center Momentum Residence
property_description:
4 Room Apartment for Sale in Momentum Residence Alanya Center – Modern Family Living Near the Sea

Some homes are built just for summer. Others, like this one in Momentum Residence, are designed for families who want to live in Alanya year-round. With 160 m² of space, four rooms, and a location just 500 meters from the sea, this apartment combines the size of a true family house with the convenience of being in the city center.

Built with modern materials and smart layouts, it feels more like a spacious city residence than a holiday flat. For buyers seeking comfort, practicality, and investment value, this property represents one of the strongest options in Alanya today.

Living Room – Spacious and Inviting

The living room makes an immediate impression with its sense of space. Light-colored marble-effect flooring and recessed spotlights brighten the area, while dark gray furniture with gold-detailed legs introduces a touch of elegance. The look is “simple yet stylish”—not overwhelming, but refined.

A modern wooden TV unit contrasts nicely with the gray-white tones of the room, adding warmth to the otherwise clean palette. The size of the living room is one of its biggest advantages: it easily accommodates large family gatherings, dinner parties, or evenings with friends.

Kitchen – Functional and Modern

The kitchen follows an L-shape design, finished in a timeless combination of white and anthracite cabinetry. The marble-pattern dining table pairs with dark velvet chairs, creating a stylish but practical setup.

For families who plan to live here year-round, the generous storage and workspace make daily cooking easier. The overall feel is modern, practical, and welcoming—a kitchen you will actually enjoy using every day.

Bedrooms – Privacy and Comfort

The master bedroom is designed for comfort. Large windows let in natural light, while curved curtain details and wooden accents create a warm, personal atmosphere. The space feels like a private retreat, complete with en-suite potential.

The second bedroom includes twin beds—ideal for children or guests. Its straightforward layout appeals especially to families, as it offers ready-to-use functionality. Additional rooms can serve as guest spaces, home offices, or even hobby rooms, depending on the buyer’s needs.

Balcony – Views of the City and Mountains

The balcony is large and framed with black wrought-iron railings, adding a classic touch of elegance. The view stretches across both the city and the surrounding mountains, giving residents the best of both worlds.

During the day, it offers freshness and light. At night, city lights create a cozy backdrop for evening dinners or quiet conversations. In Alanya, balconies are often treated like second living rooms, and this one is more than capable of fulfilling that role.

General Atmosphere

The apartment as a whole embraces the style of a modern city home. Gray tones dominate the palette, giving it a serious, urban feel, but wooden accents soften the look and prevent coldness. Materials are chosen for durability, particularly the flooring and kitchen surfaces, ensuring long-term use.

This is not a holiday-only flat. It is a full-sized, fully functional apartment designed for everyday life.

Facilities in Momentum Residence

  • Outdoor and indoor swimming pools

Life in Alanya Center
