property_title: Panoramic View Beachfront Apartment in Alanya
property_description:
Seafront 4 Room Apartment for Sale in Tosmur Alanya – Fully Furnished with Panoramic Views

If you've ever wanted to wake up to endless blue views, this place delivers exactly that. This 4-roombeachfrontapartment in Alanyasits right on the Mediterranean coastline in Tosmur area, and it's semi-furnished and ready to go.

The location really is the main selling point here. You're literally on the seafront with a south-west orientation, so you get both sunrise and sunset views. The main balcony has glass enclosure, which means you can enjoy those sea views even when it's not perfect weather outside. Plus, you get nice views of Alanya Castle and the surrounding mountains too.

The apartment is 140 m² with an open-plan layout that feels quite spacious. The large format floor tiles help make everything look bright and airy. Since it comes fully furnished, you could basically move in with just your suitcase.

 

Whether you're looking for a permanent home, somewhere for holidays, or an investment property, this ticks the boxes. The minimalist interior style is pretty adaptable if you want to change things up later.

Interior Design – Modern Minimalist with Coastal Influence

The apartment’s design follows amodern minimalist style, with clean white walls, understated ceiling details, and concealed spot lighting that adds depth without clutter. Large beige ceramic floor tiles with a glossy finish give the space a contemporary feel while reflecting natural light throughout the day.

Open-Plan Living with a View

TheAmerican-style kitchenmerges seamlessly with the living area, allowing you to enjoy sea views from almost every angle. This layout enhances social interaction—guests can relax in the lounge while you prepare meals without feeling disconnected. The kitchen itself features warm wood cabinetry paired with sleek black countertops. Upper cabinets include glass-fronted sections, perfect for displaying decorative items or storing everyday tableware within easy reach.

Main Balcony – Your Front Row to the Mediterranean

One of the apartment’s standout features is thespacious glass-enclosed balconyfacing the sea. The sliding panels can be fully opened during summer to let in the breeze or kept closed in cooler months to create a sheltered winter garden. From here, you can watch fishing boats in the morning, glowing sunsets in the evening, and the illuminated silhouette of Alanya Castle at night.

Flexible and Bright Bedrooms

The master bedroom offers direct balcony access and a wide-angle sea view—waking up here feels like staying in a boutique hotel every day. Currently, it is minimally furnished with a dark bed frame, leaving you the freedom to choose your preferred décor. Two additional rooms can serve as guest bedrooms, home offices, or walk-in wardrobes depending on your needs. Their versatility ensures the apartment adapts to different stages of life.

Additional Balconies for Multiple Lifestyles

While the main balcony captures the Mediterranean, the rear balconies overlook the Taurus Mountains and Alanya’s cityscape. They make perfect spots for morning coffee, small herb gardens, or private reading corners.

Ready for a Personal Touch – Furnished Yet Customizable

Currently, the apartment is furnished with simple, functional pieces such as a white plastic outdoor dining set with blue-striped cushions—evoking a light coastal feel. However, it offers ample opportunity for style upgrades. Rattan or teak furniture could elevate the balcony into a true luxury outdoor lounge. Indoors, you could go for:

  • Modern Coastal:Whites, blues, and natural textures like linen and sisal.

  • Contemporary Luxury:Glass, metal, and marble details with statement lighting.

  • Rustic Mediterranean:Wooden furniture, warm textiles, and terracotta accents.

The neutral color palette makes these transformations straightforward, ensuring your investment feels truly personal.

Light and Orientation – Sunshine All Day

Thanks to itssouth-west exposure, the apartment enjoys direct sunlight for most of the day. Morning light fills the bedrooms, while the living area and balcony glow in the golden afternoon sun. This orientation not only improves comfort but also reduces the need for artificial lighting, contributing to lower energy use.

Complex Features – Full Comfort Right by the Sea

The residence offers everything needed for year-round living:

  • Swimming Pool– Main and children’s pools for cooling off in summer.

  • Barbecue Area– Perfect for weekend gatherings.

  • Green Spaces– Landscaped gardens creating a tranquil setting.

  • Parking– Open car park with easy access.

  • Security– 24/7 camera system and door security.

  • Generator– Ensures uninterrupted electricity supply.

  • Caretaker Services– On-site assistance for maintenance and daily needs.

  • Direct Beach Access– Safe underpass leading straight to the shoreline.

Moreover, the building’sfrontline beach positionguarantees your view remains unobstructed for years to come—an important factor for both enjoyment and long-term value.

Investment Potential for Investors

Tosmur has grown into one of Alanya’s most desirable residential areas, attracting both local and international buyers. Its combination of beachfront living, easy access to city amenities, and a welcoming community makes it a prime choice for investors.

  • High Rental Potential– South-west facing apartments with uninterrupted sea views are among the most requested by holiday renters.

  • Resale Value– Limited supply of true seafront properties ensures stable appreciation.

  • Flexible Use– Suitable for year-round residence, seasonal holidays, or income generation.

Tosmur – Nature, Convenience, and Culture in One District

Located just east of Alanya’s city center, Tosmur offers a rare balance between urban convenience and natural beauty. It is best known for theDimçay River, a refreshing escape during the hot summer months. Families and friends gather at riverside restaurants, enjoy picnics under the shade of trees, or cool off in the icy mountain water. For those seeking more excitement, the nearby go-kart track adds a dose of adrenaline.

Daily life in Tosmur is effortless. Within walking distance, you will find:

  • Supermarkets– For all essentials.

  • Butchers & Greengrocers– Offering fresh, local produce.

  • Thursday Market– A vibrant bazaar with fruit, vegetables, clothing, and household items—almost like a small version of Istanbul’s Grand Bazaar.

While the district is compact enough to navigate on foot,bus stopson almost every corner connect you quickly to neighboring areas such asKestel, Oba, and Cikcilli, as well as Alanya’s bustling center.

Dining options range from traditional Turkish family restaurants to international cuisine. The famousDim Cave, one of Turkey’s largest publicly accessible caves, is also nearby, adding a unique natural attraction to the area.

Living Here – A Day in the Life

Imagine starting your morning with a walk along the shoreline, greeting the day with the sound of waves. After breakfast on your balcony, you could stroll to the Thursday market to pick up fresh fruit, enjoy a riverside lunch at Dimçay, then return home for an afternoon swim in the pool. In the evening, the balcony becomes your private theater for the Mediterranean sunset, followed by a relaxing barbecue with friends.

This is the lifestyle Tosmur offers—one where daily needs, leisure, and nature blend seamlessly.

Why Choose Luxury Estate Turkey as Your Trusted Partner?

Buying property in another country can feel overwhelming, but with the right partner, it becomes an exciting and secure journey. Luxury Estate Turkey ensures every client experiences a smooth and transparent process.

What We Offer:

  • Expert Local Knowledge– Our team understands the Alanya market inside out, from pricing trends to neighborhood personalities.

  • Tailored Property Search– We listen to your needs and present only those options that match your criteria.

  • Legal & Administrative Support– From title deed transfer to utility registrations, we handle the paperwork so you can focus on your move.

  • Citizenship & Residence Permit Assistance– Full guidance for those looking to qualify for Turkish citizenship or residence.

  • After-Sales Services– Renovations, furnishing, and property management for rental income.

  • Exclusive Offers– Including ourinspection trip program, where all travel expenses are covered when you proceed with a purchase.

By choosing us, you are not just buying ahome in Turkey—you are securing a profitable, enjoyable, and stress-free investment in one of Turkey’s most beautiful coastal regions.

This 4-room seafront apartment in Tosmur really does have everything - the views, the location, and that beachfront lifestyle you've been thinking about.

 

Get in touch withLuxury Estate Turkeyand we'll sort out a viewing that works for you. Can't make it out here right away? No problem - we can arrange a virtual tour so you can get a proper feel for the place. We've also got our inspection trip campaign running, which covers everything, so you can come see multiple properties without the hassle.
